pages.text: Now you can craft the aircraft in TFC.

Now the fuel consumed by the engine-driven aircraft is changed to fuel oil. $(br)Supports any fuel that can be used on lamps. $(br)Usage: Put the fuel into the $(l:mechanics/barrels)Barrel$(), and then place the barrel into the aircraft's fuel slot as the aircraft's oil tank. $(br)When the aircraft's engine starts (default long press Space), it will slowly consume the fuel oil in the tank at a rate 20 times that of a lamp (1000mB of olive oil can burn for 5 hours, a full tank of olive oil can burn for 56 hours).
